ValidationRule.description: Ensures that Contract Status is internally approved when stage is moved to executed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="International_Projects_Unit", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Contract"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Executed"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Pure_Project_ID__r.Pure_CLMS_Contract_Status__c , "Internally Approved")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contract Status must be Internally Approved
